title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 16 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 16 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: Preserve me, O God: for in thee do I put my trust.
lineList.cn: 神阿，求你保佑我，因为我投靠你。

lineList.en: O my soul, thou hast said unto the LORD, Thou art my Lord: my goodness extendeth not to thee;
lineList.cn: 我的心哪，你曾对耶和华说，你是我的主。我的好处不在你以外。

lineList.en: But to the saints that are in the earth, and to the excellent, in whom is all my delight.
lineList.cn: 论到世上的圣民，他们又美又善，是我最喜悦的。

lineList.en: Their sorrows shall be multiplied that hasten after another god: their drink offerings of blood will I not offer, nor take up their names into my lips.
lineList.cn: 以别神代替耶和华的，他们的愁苦必加增。他们所浇奠的血我不献上，我嘴唇也不题别神的名号。

lineList.en: The LORD is the portion of mine inheritance and of my cup: thou maintainest my lot.
lineList.cn: 耶和华是我的产业，是我杯中的分。我所得的你为我持守。

lineList.en: The lines are fallen unto me in pleasant places; yea, I have a goodly heritage.
lineList.cn: 用绳量给我的地界，坐落在佳美之处。我的产业实在美好。

lineList.en: I will bless the LORD, who hath given me counsel: my reins also instruct me in the night seasons.
lineList.cn: 我必称颂那指教我的耶和华。我的心肠在夜间也警戒我。

lineList.en: I have set the LORD always before me: because he is at my right hand, I shall not be moved.
lineList.cn: 我将耶和华常摆在我面前。因他在我右边，我便不至摇动。

lineList.en: Therefore my heart is glad, and my glory rejoiceth: my flesh also shall rest in hope.
lineList.cn: 因此我的心欢喜，我的灵快乐。我的肉身也要安然居住。

lineList.en: For thou wilt not leave my soul in hell; neither wilt thou suffer thine Holy One to see corruption.
lineList.cn: 因为你必不将我的灵魂撇在阴间。也不叫你的圣者见朽坏。

lineList.en: Thou wilt shew me the path of life: in thy presence is fulness of joy; at thy right hand there are pleasures for evermore.
lineList.cn: 你必将生命的道路指示我。在你的面前有满足的喜乐。在你右手中有永远的福乐。
